tool_description: An API to accent words. Accent any word in portuguese.
name: AccentWords
title: AccentWords

api_list.name: /pt/{word}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://semantics-accentwords-v1.p.rapidapi.com/pt/saude"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "semantics-accentwords-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://semantics-accentwords-v1.p.rapidapi.com/pt/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "semantics-accentwords-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
